title: Would this laptop be fine for like 50 fps or so?
body:
HP Chromebook - 11-v010nr (ENERGY STAR)

Here's the laptop that I was looking at just seeing if someone would tell me if it was good or had really bad frames, if you could would you have a look around for something better if possible for around $200-350

 thanks

replies.body: For $350 you can build a computer that runs league pretty handily. Or buy an old one from ebay/trading site. Which country are you in?, i can help you pick one.
In new Zealand bro would really appreciate it bro thanks for around $300

OK man I did a comprehensive look through trading site nz, and came up with this computer which should be useful:

[i5-quad](http://www.trademe.co.nz/computers/desktops/no-monitor/auction-1347138543.htm)

Basically you will want a computer with at least 8GB ram, and a quad core processor (if its not one of the newer generation pentiums), and a graphics card that can handle league. If the one in the above computer is not good enough (according to online sites they reckon it can handle league), [get one of these](https://pricespy.co.nz/product.php?p=4329315) (which were designed for league and other online games.)
Chromebooks are basically Google brand iPads
Chromebooks can't run League of Legends
